quizDescription.text:
For Windows, MAC Users:
Download the Wireshark Stable Release (2.6.5) Tool : Click here

For Ubuntu Users:
1. Open terminal by either pressing Ctrl+Alt+T or searching for ‘terminal’ from app launcher. When it opens, run command:
sudo add-apt-repository ppa:wireshark-dev/stable

2. Finally run following commands one by one in terminal to install Wireshark 2.6:
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install wireshark
